variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 4.40% on the portion of taxable income over $10,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of all Bracket_i in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all i brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
